Structs/PharmacyFHIRDataSource.html#/sea.name: searchPharmacies(by:position:filter:)
Structs/PharmacyFHIRDataSource.html#/sea.abstract: API for requesting pharmacies with the passed search term

Structs/PharmacyFHIRDataSource.html#/fet.name: fetchPharmacy(by:)
Structs/PharmacyFHIRDataSource.html#/fet.abstract: Convenience function for requesting a certain pharmacy by ID

Structs/DefaultPharmacyRepository.html#/.name: init(disk:cloud:)
Structs/DefaultPharmacyRepository.html#/.abstract: Initializes a new PharmacyRepository as the gateway between Presentation layer and underlying data layer(s)

Structs/DefaultPharmacyRepository.html.name: DefaultPharmacyRepository
Structs/DefaultPharmacyRepository.html.abstract: Repository for the app to the Pharmacy data layer handling the syncing between its data stores.

Structs/PharmacyFHIRDataSource.html.name: PharmacyFHIRDataSource
Structs/PharmacyFHIRDataSource.html.abstract: The remote data source for any pharmacy requests

Structs/Position.html.name: Position
Structs/Position.html.abstract: Position which is used as a search point for an “around me” search.

Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html#/updat.name: updateFromRemote(by:)
Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html#/updat.abstract: Loads the PharmacyLocation by its telematik ID from a remote server and updates only properties

Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html#/loadC.name: loadCached(by:)
Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html#/loadC.abstract: Loads the PharmacyLocation by its telematik ID from disk or if not present from a remote (server).

Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html#/searc.name: searchRemote(searchTerm:position:filter:)
Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html#/searc.abstract: Loads PharmacyLocations with search term from a remote (server).

Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html#/loadL.name: loadLocal(by:)
Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html#/loadL.abstract: Loads the PharmacyLocation by its telematik ID from disk

Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html#/save(.name: save(pharmacy:)
Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html#/save(.abstract: Creates or updates a PharmacyLocation into the store. Updates if the identifier does already exist in store

Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html#/delet.name: delete(pharmacy:)
Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html#/delet.abstract: Deletes a PharmacyLocation from the store with the related identifier

Protocols/PharmacyRemoteDataStore.html#/.name: searchPharmacies(by:position:filter:)
Protocols/PharmacyRemoteDataStore.html#/.abstract: API for requesting pharmacies with the passed search term

Protocols/PharmacyRemoteDataStore.html#/.name: fetchPharmacy(by:)
Protocols/PharmacyRemoteDataStore.html#/.abstract: Convenience function for requesting a certain pharmacy by ID

Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html.name: PharmacyRepository
Protocols/PharmacyRepository.html.abstract: Interface for the app to the Pharmacy data layer

Extensions/FHIRClient.html#/fetchPharmac.name: fetchPharmacy(by:)
Extensions/FHIRClient.html#/fetchPharmac.abstract: Convenience function for requesting a certain pharmacy by ID

Enums/PharmacyRepositoryFilter.html#/rea.name: ready
Enums/PharmacyRepositoryFilter.html#/rea.abstract: Matching pharmacies are marked as E-Rezept ready

Enums/PharmacyRepositoryFilter.html#/shi.name: shipment
Enums/PharmacyRepositoryFilter.html#/shi.abstract: Matching pharmacies provide online service for ordering medications

Enums/PharmacyFHIROperation.html.name: PharmacyFHIROperation
Enums/PharmacyFHIROperation.html.abstract: Operations we expect the pharmacy service to possibly be able to perform
